pr_title: Extend GetOperations api with mtaId query param

timeline.bodyText: Is MTA_ID in this case path variable?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Why this "last" and "state" are not presented as contants but the MTA_ID is ?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Could you put it as last param? For me, it is more intuitevly to add new method parameters in the last positions?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.message:
Extend GetOperations api with mtaId query param

Extend the GetOperations api to have a new query param for the mta id.
This will allow more native querying for operation by mta id.
JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1723 and LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1578
